item.title: Building some-recipes.com
item.description: Background Earlier this year I made my way through Fullstack Open, a course designed to teach modern Javascript-based web development. In their words: The main focus is on building single page applications with ReactJS that use REST APIs built with Node.js. The course also contains a section on GraphQL, a modern alternative to REST APIs. The course covers testing, configuration and environment management, and the use of MongoDB for storing the applicationâ€™s data.
